ygData.subject: RE: Sol B stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Kow, why u LD so many times and never died??? ;P
ygData.messageBody:
Kow, why u LD so many times and never died??? ;P

On Wednesday, 22 September, 1999 5:17 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong [SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
>
> I took 30mins to get to North Freeport. From West Freepor...
>
> It seems like that the connection for the last 2 days are really
> terrible. This afternoon around 2pm, I went to Lavastorm Mnt from North
> Freeport. It took me 4 lds to get there....
>
> LKW wrote:
> >
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > I tried a friend cyberway connection last night, 80% I'm flashing between
> > yellow and red connection. Average PL is 30%, and got freeze many times,
> > from 5sec to 2 min (that's when I was killed in najena, by bonecracker).
> > With this kinda connection, better dun hunt and do some maintenance
> > instead, like selling stuffs, casting spells in town to rise casting skills
> > or do some inventory spring cleaning ;)
> >
> > Now I gotta think twice b4 getting cyberway $48 unlimited plan. The
> > surfing also sux as compared to $ingnet. Is cyberway abnormally laggy last
> > night and just as per normal days?
> >
> > Ziltus
> >
> > On Tuesday, 21 September, 1999 8:24 PM, Tommy Fong
> > [SMTP:tommyfong@...] wrote:
> > > From: "Tommy Fong" <tommyfong@...>
> > >
> > > On Tue, 21 Sep 1999 18:16:23 +0800, Sereph wrote:
> > >
> > > >Ganna drag there by FF around midnight yesterday to take a place in a
> > > >group he was in there.
> > >
> > > Hmm...... I think it was u who ask me to accept u to my group? LOL......
> > I think it is a
> > > good idea to quit hunting once U got bad PL or lag. Last time when we
> > move to
> > > perma, I LD quite a few times but still wanna go there. In the end, I
> > can't help out at
> > > all but got killed. Heehee.
> > >
> > >
> > > Best Regards,
> > >
> > > Tommy Fong
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > > Singapore Everquest Players List
> >
> > > Singapore Everquest Players List
>
